<h3 id="X38136">X(38136) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(5), X(6)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*(b^2+c^2)*a^4-4*(b^4-3*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^2-3*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38136) = X(4)+2*X(18583) = 5*X(5)-2*X(141) = X(5)+2*X(5480) = X(5)-4*X(19130) = 2*X(5)+X(21850) = 7*X(5)-4*X(24206) = X(6)+2*X(546) = X(141)+5*X(5480) = X(141)-10*X(19130) = 4*X(141)+5*X(21850) = 7*X(141)-10*X(24206) = X(5085)-3*X(14561) = 7*X(5085)-9*X(38064) = X(5085)-9*X(38072) = 4*X(5085)-9*X(38079) = 2*X(5085)-3*X(38110) = X(5480)+2*X(19130) = 4*X(5480)-X(21850) = 7*X(5480)+2*X(24206) = 8*X(19130)+X(21850) = 7*X(19130)-X(24206) = 7*X(21850)+8*X(24206)</b>
<p>X(38136) lies on these lines: {4,5050}, {5,141}, {6,546}, {30,5085}, {69,3851}, {140,31670}, {182,3627}, {193,3855}, {373,1368}, {381,1992}, {382,3618}, {427,5640}, {428,6800}, {515,38040}, {516,38166}, {517,38146}, {518,38034}, {524,38071}, {542,23046}, {549,29181}, {550,3589}, {568,7403}, {576,3857}, {597,15687}, {599,11737}, {632,3098}, {952,38035}, {971,38164}, {1350,3628}, {1351,3091}, {1352,3850}, {1353,3818}, {1469,10593}, {1503,3845}, {1539,15118}, {1595,9730}, {1907,15072}, {2829,38168}, {3056,10592}, {3066,5159}, {3090,33878}, {3146,12017}, {3544,3620}, {3619,5079}, {3629,18553}, {3763,35018}, {3830,25406}, {3832,18440}, {3839,14848}, {3843,6776}, {3859,15069}, {3861,36990}, {5055,10519}, {5066,10516}, {5076,14927}, {5092,15704}, {5133,11002}, {5254,6249}, {5318,36758}, {5321,36757}, {5762,38145}, {5842,38169}, {5843,38143}, {5844,38144}, {5845,38137}, {5846,38138}, {5847,38140}, {5848,38141}, {5849,38142}, {5921,11482}, {5946,34146}, {6090,6997}, {6756,37506}, {7405,13340}, {7998,37439}, {8703,29317}, {8705,11563}, {9825,37497}, {9970,11801}, {9993,37451}, {10095,19161}, {10168,15686}, {10264,32271}, {10301,14389}, {10982,19139}, {11179,14893}, {11459,31802}, {11477,12811}, {11539,19924}, {11548,33586}, {13331,15048}, {13363,23335}, {14810,14869}, {14984,36518}, {15681,33750}, {16981,37353}, {18383,34774}, {20300,33332}, {28146,38118}, {28160,38049}, {28174,38047}, {28186,38029}, {28202,38089}, {28212,38116}, {29323,33699}, {33540,34817}, {33884,37990}, {35268,37649}</p>
<p>
X(38136) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 5050}, {381, 14853}, {1352, 5102}, {3818, 15520}, {3830, 25406}, {3839, 14848}, {10516, 20423}, {31670, 31884}<br>
X(38136) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (550, 17508), (1353, 15520), (5050, 18583), (10516, 5066), (17508, 3589), (31884, 140), (38110, 14561)<br>
X(38136) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 5480, 21850), (1351, 3091, 18358), (1353, 3858, 3818), (5480, 19130, 5), (14561, 38110, 38079), (38147, 38148, 38035)<br>
</p>
